Control Name: 9.2. Ensure web app redirects all HTTP traffic to HTTPS in Azure App Service
Control Statement: Enabling HTTPS-only traffic will redirect all non-secure HTTP request to HTTPS ports.

control_attributes.description: Enabling HTTPS-only traffic will redirect all non-secure HTTP request to HTTPS ports.
